# USGS Copyright

The information used from the United States Geological Survey web service was obtained freely under their Public Release of Information policy. Copyright for this information is under the Public Domain and no warranty is implied or expressed on their part or mine.

# Seismic Data

There is extensive use of information and data from the United States Geological Survey who have a number of great online services:

  • Earthquake FAQ
  • Event Map
  • USGS API Docs
